messages.index.title: Home Page
messages.index.description: ASP.NET is a free web framework for building great Web sites and Web applications using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
messages.index.startdescription: ASP.NET MVC gives you a powerful, patterns-based way to build dynamic websites that enables a clean separation of concerns and gives you full control over markup for enjoyable, agile development.
messages.index.libdescription: NuGet is a free Visual Studio extension that makes it easy to add, remove, and update libraries and tools in Visual Studio projects.
messages.index.hostdescription: You can easily find a web hosting company that offers the right mix of features and price for your applications.
